title: Azure Synapse dedicated SQL pool experiencing automatic pause during active workload
description: Our dedicated SQL pool keeps pausing automatically even though we have active queries running. This is disrupting our real-time analytics dashboards and causing connection failures for BI tools.

title: Azure Stream Analytics job failing with deserialization errors on IoT Hub input
description: Our Stream Analytics job is throwing deserialization exceptions when processing messages from IoT Hub. The JSON messages appear malformed but we can't identify which devices are sending bad data.

title: Power BI embedded reports timing out when connecting to Analysis Services
description: Embedded Power BI reports in our application are timing out when querying Azure Analysis Services. Direct queries from Power BI Desktop work fine, but embedded scenarios fail after 30 seconds.

title: Azure Purview data scan failing on Oracle database with TNS listener error
description: Purview automated scan cannot connect to our on-premises Oracle database. Getting TNS:listener error even though the Self-hosted Integration Runtime is online and firewall rules are configured.

title: Azure DevOps pipeline deployment to Azure Functions slot swap rollback failing
description: Our CI/CD pipeline deploys Azure Functions using slot swap. When deployment validation fails and we attempt automatic rollback, the swap back operation hangs and never completes, leaving us in an inconsistent state.

title: Event Grid subscription missing events during high throughput bursts
description: Our Event Grid subscription is dropping events during traffic spikes. We're sending approximately 5000 events per second, but subscribers only receive about 60% of them. No error messages in monitoring.

title: Azure API Management policy transformation breaking SOAP envelope structure
description: We're using APIM to transform SOAP requests before forwarding to backend. The XML transformation policy is corrupting the SOAP envelope structure, causing the backend service to reject requests with invalid namespace errors.

title: Azure Container Instances restart loop due to secret volume mount failure
description: Our ACI containers enter a restart loop when we try to mount secrets from Azure Key Vault as volumes. The containers start successfully without secret volumes but fail immediately when secrets are mounted.

title: Azure Kubernetes Service pod autoscaler not scaling down after load decreases
description: HPA successfully scales up pods during high traffic but refuses to scale down when load drops. Pods remain at maximum count indefinitely, wasting resources. Scaling down manually works fine.

title: Azure Backup for SAP HANA database failing with pre-script validation errors
description: Automated backups for our SAP HANA database on Azure VM are failing. The pre-backup script validation returns errors about insufficient privileges even though the backup user has correct grants.

title: Azure Machine Learning pipeline dataset version conflict in production environment
description: Our ML pipeline is failing because different steps are trying to use incompatible versions of the same dataset. The dataset was updated in the workspace but one legacy step still references the old schema.

title: Azure Front Door custom domain SSL certificate renewal failing validation
description: Automatic SSL certificate renewal for our custom domain in Azure Front Door is failing. The domain validation challenge cannot complete because DNS propagation times out. Manual renewal also fails.

title: Azure Service Bus dead-letter queue growing indefinitely without processing
description: Messages are moving to dead-letter queue but our DLQ processor cannot consume them. Getting MessageLockLost exceptions even though we're renewing locks. DLQ message count has reached 500,000.

title: Azure Monitor workbook query performance degraded after Log Analytics workspace merge
description: After consolidating multiple Log Analytics workspaces into one, our Azure Monitor workbooks are taking 10x longer to render. Queries that took 2 seconds now time out after 60 seconds.

title: Azure Cognitive Search indexer failing on PDF documents with specific encoding
description: Our search indexer processes most PDFs successfully but fails on documents with certain encodings. Error indicates unsupported character encoding even though the PDFs open fine in standard readers.

title: Azure Application Gateway health probe marking healthy backends as unhealthy
description: Application Gateway intermittently marks our backend servers as unhealthy even though they're responding correctly to health probes. This causes unnecessary traffic redistribution and connection resets.

title: Azure Redis Cache experiencing slow performance after scaling operation
description: After scaling our Redis Cache from Basic to Standard tier, we're seeing 5x increase in latency for GET operations. Cache hit ratio is normal but response times went from 2ms to 10ms average.

title: Azure SignalR Service connection drops during regional failover test
description: During our disaster recovery test, Azure SignalR Service connections dropped and didn't automatically reconnect when failing over to secondary region. Clients had to manually refresh to reconnect.

title: Azure Time Series Insights query returning incomplete data for historical range
description: Queries for data older than 90 days return partial results or empty datasets. Recent data queries work fine. Warm store shows correct record counts but queries don't return all data.

title: Azure Automation runbook webhook authentication failing after certificate rollover
description: External systems calling our Automation Account webhooks are getting 401 authentication errors. This started immediately after we rotated the webhook certificate. New webhook URLs work but we can't update all external callers quickly.
